name: Rubik's Cube (itch) (Matt J Hart)
description:
This is a virtual 3x3 Rubik's Cube that I have made with Unity and FMOD. There are 3 modes:

  • Random Shuffle - Standard cube randomisation
  • Daily Challenge - The cube is shuffled uniquely for each day
  • Seeded Shuffle - The cube is shuffled according to a seed inputted by the player

Controls

  • Rotate entire cube - WASD or right click and drag
  • Alternate WASD rotation mode - Left Shift (Hold)
  • Rotate face - Left click and drag
  • Rotate face 180 degrees - Middle click
  • Enable "front" rotation mode - Left Shift (Hold)
  • Snap mouse rotation to 90 degrees - Left Ctrl (Hold)
  • Straighten cube - Q
  • Reset game - R
  • Quit game - Escape

By default, dragging a sticker rotates the face that is adjacent to the sticker you clicked. If you hold Left Shift you can switch to "front" mode which rotates the face that the sticker is on instead.

Please note: you can't drag a middle sticker outwards, but you can make middle rotations by dragging from an outer edge piece.

Audio Engine: FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.

Unaffiliated with Rubik's Brand Ltd.
